page.title: 17POCKET MONEY OF A 9 YR.OLD
page.content: We did a survey of our class's pocket money.There are 30 of us in our class and we all receive pocket money.The average amount of pocket money is Â£1 per week. 24{save money in a bank or {building society}. 6 of us get extra pocket money for{helping around the {house}. On average 20p is spent on {sweets}and could buy a pack of Polos and Smarties.Many of us save up for things like{Lego}and{extra clothes.} A few of us spend money on{comics or {books},but usually our parents pay for these.We also save up for going on {holiday.}Only a quarter of us pay for our own{cinema ticket}to see a film. More than half of us have just started using our own money to buy{presents {for our families}on birthdays and at Christmas.
